job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongSummarystrongppAs a Data Scientist at Fast you will partner closely with product managers engineering design marketing sales or other operational leaders to define core metricsKPIs generate actionable data insights from large datasets build automated dashboards using data pipelines and run experiments to measure impact of new initiativesppnbspppstrongRolestrongpulliRun complex data queries analyze large datasets and run statistical analyses to continuously drive deeper understanding of our customers and product performanceliliCreate dashboards and reports with effective data visualizationsliliBe a thought partner to business leaders in determining quantitative success and process improvementliliBuild data pipelines and create scripts to automate processes and reportsliliBuild models to improve our understanding of user behavior and predict future performancenbspliulpbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulli3 years of experience in quantitative analysis rolesliliFluent in SQL and a scripting language R PythonliliKnowledge of experimentation and statistical methodsliliBS in quantitative field or equivalent experienceliliSkilled with Looker Jupyter Notebook and other data visualization toolsliulpbrppstrongNice to Havestrongpulli5 years of experience in quantitative analysis rolesliliAdvanced degree in quantitative field or equivalent experienceliliKnowledge of building data pipelines eg dbt airflowliliExperience in ecommerce industryliliPrevious mature startup experienceliulpp
